text: Music for Perla is a solo album by pianist Tete Montoliu recorded in 1974 and released on the Danish label, SteepleChase.SteepleChase Records discography, accessed March 18, 2015Tete Montoliu discography, accessed March 18, 2015 ==Reception== Ken Dryden of AllMusic states, "Beautifully recorded in a bright-sounding studio with a first-rate piano, this CD is a great example of Tete Montoliu's abilities early in his recording career.". ==Track listing== All compositions by Tete Montoliu except as indicated # "Yesterdays" (Otto Harbach, Jerome Kern) - 6:07 # "Here's That Rainy Day" (Johnny Burke, Jimmy Van Heusen) - 5:11 # "Margareta" (Perry Robinson) - 4:57 # "Imagination" (Burke, Van Heusen) - 5:11 # "Have You Met Miss Jones?" (Lorenz Hart, Richard Rodgers) - 4:05 # "I Feel All Alone" - 2:50 # "What Is It?" - 1:15 # "Circe" - 2:33 # "Gentofte 4349" - 2:31 # "Apartment 512" - 11:23 ==Personnel== *Tete Montoliu – piano ==References== Category:Tete Montoliu albums Category:1974 albums Category:SteepleChase Records albums Category:Solo piano jazz albums
